body_html: I believe the problem is that you can't start the queue runners until you have a queue created or else it will dead lock. That is what your workaround does. You might want to take a look at using the dataset feeding mechanism which is much simpler to use and more intuitive.

body: I believe the problem is that you can't start the queue runners until you have a queue created or else it will dead lock. That is what your workaround does. You might want to take a look at using the dataset feeding mechanism which is much simpler to use and more intuitive.
